We fought the tools and the tools lost.

## Time worked
Approximate total is between 3.5 and 4.0 hours.

Breakdown
- Infra and repo setup: 30 to 40 minutes
- Astro scaffold and recovery: 60 to 75 minutes
- Logbook system and collections: 45 to 60 minutes
- Layouts, IA, YAML fixes, commits: 45 to 60 minutes

## What we did
- Created and initialized GitHub repo
- Scaffolded Astro and stabilized Windows tooling issues
- Implemented content collections schema
- Built logbook list and entry pages
- Added Base layout and IA routes
- Created META governance documents
- Added per-project hubs for EIDOLON and Cyber Bar

## Resume point
Next session focus is data-driven Work and Labs pages powered by project.json.
